title: ISic000187. I.Sicily inscription 000187
body:
Facsimile Images

L(ucius) ((·)) Iulius ((·)) L(uci) ((·)) f(ilius) ((·)) Quir(ina tribu)
Attilianus
vix(it) ((·)) an(nis) ((·)) XIX
mens(ibus) ((·)) VII ((·)) d(iebus) ((·)) XIIII

Apparatus criticus

Text of ILTermini

English translation

Lucius Iulius Attilianus, son of Lucius, of the Quirina tribe, lived for 19 years, 7 months, 14 days.

commentary

bibliography
